alert.note: Alert for La Crosse; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 19 at 1:09PM CDT until April 25 at 9:24AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Black River at Black River Falls affecting Jackson County. Black River Near Galesville affecting Trempealeau and La Crosse Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River Near Galesville. * WHEN...From Friday morning to late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Flooding mainly impacts wildlands and agricultural pasture land. However the approach to the south end of the County Road VV Bridge over the Black River may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 8.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Friday morning to a crest of 13.5 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Monday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse.
